languages.text: "Конечно". {n}Мягко улыбнувшись, Соломон обнимает вас за плечи.{/n}
"Of course." {n}Smiling softly, Solomorne wraps his arm around your shoulders.{/n}

languages.text: 「もちろんです」{n}ソロモーンは柔らかく微笑みながら、あなたの肩に腕を回した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course." {n}Smiling softly, Solomorne wraps his arm around your shoulders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「もちろんです」{n}ソロモーンは柔らかく微笑みながら、あなたの肩に腕を回した。{/n}

languages.text: "Natürlich." {n}Solomorne lächelt sanft und legt seinen Arm um deine Schultern.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course." {n}Smiling softly, Solomorne wraps his arm around your shoulders.{/n}

languages.text: « Volontiers. » {n}Un doux sourire aux lèvres, Solomorne passe son bras autour de vos épaules.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course." {n}Smiling softly, Solomorne wraps his arm around your shoulders.{/n}

languages.text: «Desde luego». {n}Solomorne sonríe con dulzura y te rodea los hombros con el brazo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course." {n}Smiling softly, Solomorne wraps his arm around your shoulders.{/n}
